basics.name: Joshua Nishiguchi
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2019.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Create and debug stored procedures used to assist students in registering for courses using STAR.
highlights: Maintain and introduce new backend features to assist University of Hawaii students in completing their graduation goals on time

awards.title: NASA Space Apps Challenge - 7th Place Internationally
awards.summary: My team got to 7th place internationally in the people's choice section. You can see our award for being Top 25 here: https://2016.spaceappschallenge.org/challenges/mars/space-route-66/projects/koala-space-program and our solution on my github.

awards.title: Second place - AT&T Mobile App Hackathon
awards.summary: My team won second place for creating a mobile app which sent alerts to a person's mobile device whenever mail gets placed into a mailbox.
